apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss emoji between a woman of medium-dark skin tone and a person of dark skin tone is portrayed with tender intimacy, featuring soft, rounded facial forms and a warm, romantic glow. The subtle shading and realistic lighting on Apple devices enhance the gentle curve of the lips and the connection between the two figures, evoking affection and love. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully communicates romantic feelings, endearment, and passionate moments.
